page.title: 20RECREATION-CUBS AND SCOUTS
page.content: Pencoed has very good organisations for young people. Many boys from the town belong to one of the 6 cub packs or scout troops that we have. There is also a venture scout troop for older boys and girls. There is great enthusiam with the leaders and the scouts hold a number of fund raising events which means they now have their own hut. These units give plenty of opportunities to their members and they have been very successful with their work in the community. The girl guides have two packs and meet on a regular basis. Again there if great interest shown by the girls and this year they are, in fact, celebrating their 75th anniversary.
